info.name: Tutanota - Dark
info.description: Dark theme for Tutanota email (2.0, not sure if it works with 3.0).
info.additionalInfo:
Discovered Tutanota, quite liked it, but the white colour scheme burnt my eyes slightly.

Botched together this dark theme in about half an hour, so I expect there to be some bits that don't work, leave a comment if you find anything that looks wrong.
